solidstack.query.jpa
Class JPASupport

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.query.jpa.JPASupport

public class JPASupport
extends Object

Adds support for JPA. JPA dependencies must be kept separate from the rest.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

executeUpdate

public static int executeUpdate(Query query,
                                javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                Object args)
Executes an update (DML) or a DDL query through the given EntityManager.

Parameters:
query - The query.
entityManager - The EntityManager to use.
args - The arguments to the query. When a map, then the contents of the map. When an Object, then the JavaBean properties.
Returns:
The number of entities updated or deleted.
See Also:
Query.executeUpdate()
